title: Naptime
description: Interrupt an enemy Ultimate Ability with a Sleep Dart. (Ana)

title: Sleeping Angel
description: Get an Environmental Elimination with Sleep Dart. (Ana)

title: Biotic Boom
description: Hit 3 enemies at once with a single Biotic Grenade. (Ana)

title: Stand By Me
description: Prevent a death using an Immortality Field without dying yourself. (Baptiste)

title: Amplified Support
description: Get an Elimination/Assist through your Amplification Matrix. (Baptiste)

title: Excuse Me
description: Get a killing blow with Shield Bash. (Brigitte)

title: Grounded
description: Kill an airborne enemy with Whip Shot. (Brigitte)

title: Let's Get Whippy
description: Get an Environmental Elimination with Whip Shot. (Brigitte)

title: Solar Flare
description: Detonate a Sunstruck enemy after using Captive Sun. (Illari)

title: Pulsars Inbound
description: Hit 6 targets with a single use of Pulsar Torpedoes. (Juno)

title: Terrible Torpedo
description: Eliminate an enemy using Pulsar Torpedoes. (Juno)

title: Purified
description: Cleanse 2 negative effects with one use of Protection Suzu. (Kiriko)

title: Zu-Zu
description: Prevent a death using Protection Suzu without dying yourself. (Kiriko)

title: Kunai Expert
description: Deliver 3 headshots in a row by throwing Kunai. (Kiriko)

title: Life Weaving
description: Prevent a death with Life Grip without dying yourself. (Lifeweaver)

title: Boop!
description: Get a killing blow with Soundwave. (Lucio)

title: Push Off
description: Get an Environmental Elimination with Soundwave. (Lucio)

title: Valkyrie
description: Get an Elimination while in Valkyrie. (Mercy)

title: Angel on your Shoulder
description: Resurrect 3 teammates without dying. (Mercy)

title: Deconstruction
description: Get a killing blow with a Biotic Orb. (Moira)

title: Destruction Beam
description: Eliminate an enemy with Coalescence. (Moira)

title: Reverse the Tide
description: Eliminate an enemy with Tidal Blast. (Wuyang)

title: Get Washed
description: Eliminate an enemy with Guardian Wave. (Wuyang)

title: Kicker
description: Get an Environmental Elimination with Snap Kick. (Zenyatta)

title: Transcend
description: Prevent your death using Transendence. (Zenyatta)
